aboutProject.heading: Za Ntchitoyi
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ndi zojambulajambula komanso setilaiti yomwe ikufuna kukhala kachisi wophatikizana kwambiri, womangidwa pomwe palibe makoma omwe angafike. Ntchitoyi idapangidwa ndi wojambula waku Brazil Edson Pavoni, wojambula kumbuyo kwa Inumeráveis Memorial yomwe idafikira munthu m'modzi mwa anthu 6 aliwonse ku Brazil panthawi ya mliri wa COVID, polojekitiyi imapempha anthu padziko lonse lapansi kuti atumize dzina la munthu yemwe akufuna kumukumbukira. Mayinawa amatumizidwa ku satellite mu orbit, kupanga chikumbutso chamagulu.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Kudzera patsamba lomwe likupezeka m'zilankhulo 136, otenga nawo mbali amachita mwambo watsopano. Orbital Temple imayang'ana mitu yophatikizika, kukumbukira, ndi umunthu womwe timagawana nawo, ndikufunsa chifukwa chake palibe kachisi wakuthupi Padziko Lapansi yemwe angalandire aliyense, ndikulingalira kuti danga ndi malo okhawo omwe atha kukhalapo.

aboutArtist.heading: Za Wojambula
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni ndi wojambula waku Brazil yemwe ulendo wake unayambira m'misewu ya São Paulo, komwe umphawi ndi chiwawa zidapanga zaka zake zoyambirira. M’dziko limene Chikristu chimapereka njira yotalikirana ndi misewu, mankhwala osokoneza bongo, ndi chiwawa, Pavoni anapeza pothaŵirapo m’chikhulupiriro, mutu umene pambuyo pake, pamene anakhala wotsutsa nkhanza zachipembedzo, udzadziŵitsa ntchito yake yaluso.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Mu 2020, panthawi ya mliri wa COVID-19, Pavoni adapanga Inumeráveis (osawerengeka) , chojambula chomwe chili pamzere wa zaluso ndi utolankhani. Ntchitoyi idafunsa mabanja masauzande ambiri ndikulemba nkhani za omwe adataya mliriwu, ndikupanga malo omwe kukumbukira kumapitilira ziwerengero ndi ziwerengero. Ndakatulo, nyimbo, ndi masimphoni anapangidwa ndi nkhani zimenezo. Nyuzipepala zinapanga zolemba pogwiritsa ntchito mayina ndi mbiri. Nyenyezi zonse za ku Brazil monga Oscar wopambana Fernanda Torres, ndi nyenyezi monga Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo ndi Lazaro Ramos, ndi ena ambiri amawerenga nkhani zimenezo pa televizioni ya dziko. Ntchitoyi inafikira anthu 32 miliyoni, mmodzi mwa akuluakulu anayi aku Brazil. Inakhala gulu la machiritso, chipilala chokumbukira pamodzi.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Pambuyo pa kukambitsirana kopitirira zikwi khumi ndi chisoni, chitsanzo chinatuluka: pamene tilankhula za munthu amene wamwalira, timasankha zidutswa za nkhani yake monga ngati kuti tikulembera mlonda wa pachipata cha paradaiso kalata yoyamikira. Timayesetsa kuwatumiza kumene timakhulupirira kuti ndi kumwamba. Ntchitoyi inayambitsa kumvetsetsa kwatsopano: Zikhulupiriro zathu za yemwe ali woyenera kumwamba zimaumba mwachindunji omwe timavomereza kapena kuwapatula Padziko Lapansi. Atsamunda Achipwitikizi ku Brazil ankakhulupirira kuti anthu akuda alibe miyoyo; chikhulupiriro chimenecho chinalungamitsa ukapolo. Ngati munali mbadwa, ngati munabadwira kumalo olakwika kapena kukonda munthu wolakwika, mumauzidwabe kuti zitseko zakumwamba zatsekedwa kwa inu mpaka pano. Kodi pali masomphenya amtsogolo omwe sali odzazidwa ndi kukanidwa?
aboutArtist.paragraph4: Umu ndi momwe Orbital Temple inabadwira.

team.content: Orbital Temple imapangidwa mogwirizana ndi Sathi Roy, Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista, João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Daphne Alves, Flavio Pedro Vidigal Vigal Putti, Rafael Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, ndi onse omwe akupitiliza kupereka mayina a kachisiyu.

pressCoverage.heading: Zowonetsedwa mu / Press Coverage
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Makanema atolankhani ndi mawonekedwe adzawonjezedwa akapezeka. Kuti mudziwe zambiri, chonde lemberani gulu lathu la atolankhani.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Ziwonetsero zam'mbuyomu ndi mawonekedwe ake akuphatikizapo zowonetsera pa 13th Mercosul Bienal, kuzindikira kuchokera ku Mphoto ya Lumen, ndi kusankhidwa ndi Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
